title: LF support main for Duo in Gold 4~.
body:
Add me in-game, or post your most experienced supports here.

Must have:
- skype/curse voice. (just preferred, but not necessary)
- manners, because raging in a sin people!

replies.body:
Gold V Support Main.

Best champs: {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:412}} and {{champion:37}}
